summary: Diff adds a single-page scrolling React frontend with the required sections, brand gradient styling, portfolio/results assets referenced from /assets/generated, and a Motoko backend for contact form submission storage and admin-only retrieval. Main gaps are around the Testimonials section lacking a CTA, and several unrequested authentication/authorization and footer attribution features were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure every major section (Hero, About, Services, Portfolio, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact) contains a prominent call-to-action button as specified, with sensible navigation.
missing_requirements.reason: TestimonialsSection renders quotes and supporting text but includes no CTA button, so not every major section has a CTA.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication layer and actor creation logic tied to identity (including admin token handling).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request login/auth, identity providers, or admin-token URL/session parsing for end users; only requires contact form storage without third-party services.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend access-control/authorization mixin and admin-only gating for listing submissions via a secret initialization flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 requires a query method to list submissions but does not require an authorization framework, secret token initialization, or role/permission system.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile APIs (get/save user profiles).
hallucinated_features.reason: No user profile functionality is requested in any requirement or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional backend method getContactInfo returning email/phone.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9 requires the frontend display email/phone placeholder; it does not require a dedicated backend endpoint for public contact info.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM parameters and a red heart icon styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any footer attribution, external links, or the use of non-brand colors for UI elements.
